td.content: s:a m aged 52 ys with mild diarrhea, mild nausea, mild abdominal pain and Stomach. he has had several such episodes over past 13 months. patient has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 191 cm, Weight 102.6 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 68, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16, all lung fields, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, distension, no hepatomegaly a:Irritable Bowel p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed dicyclomine - 20 mg 4 x day, and ordered CBC.
